summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3607 for the improvement of 34th Avenue West, from Gilman Avenue to McCord Place, and from Emerson Street to Ruffner Street, reet; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers, and branch or lateral sewers, under Ordinance No. 44600 by levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
